original_text: Shimei had 16 sons and six daughters. But his brothers did not have many children. So their clan did not become as large as the people of Judah's tribe.
korean_text: 시므이에게는 아들 열여섯과 딸 여섯이 있으나 그의 형제에게는 자녀가 몇이 못되니 그들의 온 종족이 유다 자손처럼 번성하지 못하였더라

sentences.original_text: Shimei had 16 sons and six daughters
sentences.korean_translation: 시므이는 열여섯 아들과 여섯 딸을 두었고

sentences.original_text: But his brothers did not have many children
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그의 형제들은 자녀가 많지 않았으며

sentences.original_text: So their clan did not become as large
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 그들의 족속은 그렇게 커지지 않았고

sentences.original_text: as the people of Judah's tribe
